1597690.name: Road 96 Demo
1597690.description:
This demo of Road 96 represents a very small chunk of the many roads you will travel during the game. No one's road will be the same.
Please be aware the game is still work in progress and the current demo does not represent the final quality of the experience.

Like the final game, this demo is meant to be replayed.
Try out different answers and decisions to alter your journey and see where you end up!
1597690.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
